Html:
Hi,

On postback, the .Text property always returns an empty string. Trying to use Request.Form on the control name also does not work.

Am I doing something wrong?
A follow up, I discovered that .Text is populated if I submit the form when RTE is in HTML View, if it is in WYSIWYG view, I get nothing.
I used the Request.Form|parent$...$editor| to extract the value.
